title: Layouts
description: Layouts describe all page arrengements, containers, and container arrengements at the highest level.

sections.title: Container and Section
description: Containers set `horizontal spacing` including left/right `margin/padding` as well as `max-width` (or a speicified `width`). Sections set `vertical spacing` including bottom/top `margin/padding`.

sections.title: Rows
description: `Rows` contain `spans` to create grids. Colours in examples added for visualization by the docs.

sections.title: Create Rows
description: The default rows use `@mixin rows($gutter, $columns)` to generate the necessary css for the grid. This means that new grids can be created on demand by providing a `gutter percentage` and a `number of columns` to the mixin.

Name row classes `row-descriptor` where `descriptor` stands for a single descriptive word. Rows are not extensions of a generic, they are self contained classes so the modifier patter doesn't apply (ie. `row -descriptor` would be wrong).
Rewriting the default rows before creating alternative grids is mandatory if the defaults are not in use.
